Posts.Content: OregonMary wrote: Do I need to worry about radiation with one kidney?  I have just been diagnosed with 'Invasive Ductal Carcinoma' and I have one kidney from previous cancer surgery.  I am very concerned about radiation effects on my surviving healthy kidney.  Any help? Thanks...Mary Log in to post a reply
